short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Push Manufacturers and Responsible Persons data to Amazon Seller Central with ease!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can upload Manufacturers and Responsible Persons data to Amazon Seller Central with ease and be compliant with GPSR as fast as you can. Just fetch your data from your MarketRock account or upload it to the extension using a standard CSV file. 

As soon as your data is loaded, you will be able to push data to Amazon Seller Central.
